Dialogue: Such a tragedy what happened to those kids last night . . . I'm so sorry for your loss.
It's a miracle that you're alive. How were you able to survive the collapse?
However you did, I'm grateful you're here.
What has this world come to!? To be honest, I was surprised to wake up this morning.
Thankfully, we've been blessed with a second chance. We should all do what we can to move forward.
I want to use the rest of my days to rebuild this orphanage and bring a better life to as many children as I can.
I'll give them the life that I wanted to give to my kids!
Until then stay with me at my house, I'll make sure you're taken care of.
I lost my kids in a house fire many years ago . . . I don't think I'll ever stop thinking about them.
These are strange times, I'm going to do my best to help out the children in this town to be safe.
